reviewText: This item was delivered on time. great viewing and great sub-titles.  Item was delivered on time and I am very satisfied with this product

magnificent epos about the legendary Korean king Sejong , who invented the unique HANGEUL script. This story reveiles how this script  was constructed, as a result of thoroughly scientific research. great story, great acting, unique document!
